creator: sebb@apache.org
text:
http://ant.apache.org/nightlies.html gives the Hudson links as (e.g.):

http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/view/Ant//Ivy/lastBuild/

However this should be

http://hudson.zones.apache.org/hudson/view/Ant/job/Ivy/lastBuild/

similarly for the other Hudson links.

It might be worth adding links for Ant itself at the same time.

creator: jan@materne.de
text:
Changed the stylesheet for adding the "job" into the URL.
Also updated the links to Hudson hosting + project.
Added the Ant jobs and the missing Ivy job.
Added the build commands.

svn rev. 1026123

creator: sebb@apache.org
text: The links are broken again since the move to Jenkins.
